name: The Yin
description:
Defend your paper from unwanted splotches. Shoot down the inky invaders and dodge their bullets to earn a high score. There are 4 types of invaders that may require different strategies to defeat. 

    Controls: A => Move left  |  D => Move right  |  Click/hold => Fire weapon

    Updates are coming, including more enemies, weapons, and maybe game progression. This is our first published game, so please notify us on any bugs or suggestions. Have fun!

Made with Replit
